subject: Re: Flushed pending centeris patch queue
body:

> 
> There's other minor fixes.  I tried to break the commits
> up into manage chunks (about 30 I think).

Thanks for all the work. I'm intending to review
them all but this may take some time :-).

Cheers,

	Jeremy.
